intro.title: Mint, Burn, Claim
intro.subtitle: Mintr is a dApp for SNX holders to mint synthetic assets (Synths) and participate in the Synthetix Network.

intro.title: Connect wallet
intro.subtitle: Please connect a wallet with your SNX holdings to continue.

success.title: Select Wallet
success.subtitle: Please select the wallet you would like to use with Mintr

loading.connectInstructions: Please follow the prompts on your device to unlock your wallet.

intro.title: What would you like to do?
intro.subtitle: Click any button below to view more info, confirm or change the amount before submitting.

transfer.title: Transfer
transfer.description: Transfer SNX, Synths or ETH to another wallet

action.title: Mint
action.subtitle: Mint sUSD by staking and locking your SNX. This gives you a collateralisation ratio and a debt, allowing you to earn staking rewards.
action.instruction: Confirm or enter amount to mint:

action.title: Burn
action.subtitle: Burn sUSD to unlock your staked Synths. This reduces your collateralisation ratio and eliminates your debt, allowing you to transfer your SNX.
action.instruction: Confirm or enter amount to burn:

action.title: Claim
action.subtitle: If you have locked your SNX and minted sUSD, you are eligible to collect two kinds of rewards: SNX staking rewards, and sUSD trading rewards generated on Synthetix.Exchange (sX).
action.note: Note: if not collected in the current period it will be forfeited and rolled over into the fee pool for the next fee period.

action.title: Trade
action.subtitle: Trade your Synths for sUSD. For a more detailed interface that allows you to trade between any Synths, use our Synthetix.Exchange dApp.

action.title: Transfer
action.subtitle: Transfer your ETH, SNX or Synths to another wallet.
action.amountInstruction: Enter amount or select max available:
action.walletInstruction: Enter wallet address to send funds to:

intro.title: Depot:
intro.subtitle: Deposit sUSD you’ve freshly minted into a queue to be sold on Synthetix.Exchange, and you’ll receive the proceeds of all sales in ETH. While your sUSD is in the queue waiting to be sold, you can withdraw your sUSD back into your wallet at any time. Note: minimum deposit is 50 sUSD.

action.title: Deposit
action.subtitle: Amount available:
action.instruction: Enter deposit amount or select max available:

staking.title: Vest your SNX staking rewards in escrow
staking.subtitle: If you have locked your SNX and minted sUSD, you are eligible to receive SNX staking rewards, which you can vest here. All SNX staking rewards are escrowed for 12 months.

tokenSale.title: Vest your token sale SNX in escrow
tokenSale.subtitle: If you participated in the SNX token sale and chose to escrow your SNX, you can vest them here.

complete.title: Deposit in progress!
complete.subtitle: Sent to the Ethereum network and will be available in your wallet shortly. You may close this window as the transaction completes in the background.

transactionSettings.title: Set transaction speed and gas
transactionSettings.subtitle: Adjust the slider below to set the transaction speed and Ethereum Network Fees (Gas) before proceeding.

confirmation.title: Please confirm transaction
confirmation.subtitle: To continue, follow the prompts on your <1>walletType</1> Wallet.

complete.subtitle: Sent to the Ethereum network and will be available in your wallet shortly. You may close this window as the transaction completes in the background.

maintenance.title: Mintr is currently unavailable due to upgrades.
maintenance.subtitle: Sorry for the inconvenience, it shall be back shortly.
